text: By clicking the good mask(n) button or pressing key 'N' a GOOD MASK is anotated.
Bt clicking on bad mask(m) or press key 'M' then a BAD MASK is anotated .
By Clicking on back(b) or press key 'B' whole anotated  mask is cleared
By Clicking  on undo(d) or press key 'D' to UNDO the individual actions performed previously .
Click the NEXT button after completing each pert of the experiment  .
Individual tasks to be performed in each step are displayed .
Short instructions guiding the actions to be performed  are displayed here.
